game.name: You are the Bomb: A Game About Rolling Bombs
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Collect coins, gems and gun powder, uncover secrets, and conquer epic bosses across time-based levels. Test your skills by mastering the rolling mechanics in this action-packed 3D platformer! Face dynamic environments, harness powerful abilities, and race to save the magical world of Boomerland!
